St._Louis.Queeny Tower: Queeny Tower, built in 1965 and named for Monsanto Company founder John Francis Queeny, is a medical facility on the campus of Washington University School of Medicine. At 321 feet (98 m), it is the third tallest medical-related building in the Western Hemisphere, as well as the second tallest building (after the Park East Tower) in St. Louis outside the downtown area.
